title: Rajbhasha Vibhag
content: Rajbhasha Vibhag promotes the use of Hindi in the campus [ unverified ]

Rajbhasha Vibhag, IIT Kharagpur is a committee of people responsible for promoting Hindi lingual activities around the campus and translation of various Reports and Accounts in Hindi language and send to the Parliament of Government of India.
↑ "Presidents, Chairmen and In-charges" . IIT Kharagpur . Retrieved 17 May 2015 .
